wikipedia_page.main: John Desmond Seys-Llewellyn (3 May 1912 – 4 April 2003) was a Welsh barrister who took part in the prosecution of the Nuremberg Trials. He was also a Liberal Party politician and later became a county court judge.

response: * John Seys-Llewellyn – Barrister prosecuting during the Nuremberg Trials
